data.title: Nikolay Krushkov on LinkedIn: The book Security Leadership Creativity was presented at the Exhibition…
data.meta_description:
The book Security Leadership Creativity was presented at the Exhibition Seafuture 2023, La Spezia, Italy. 
The Exhibition was visited by the Мinister of…
data.text: His Excellency Mr. Luca Poggiali - distinguished Italian author and publisher in the field of security and defense - delivered a speech at MILITALIA exhibition in Milano, and also reflected on his book dedicated to The Franchi LF-57 - the classic Italian sub machine gun chambered in 9x19 Parabellum. The gun was designed in 1957 and manufactured by the Italian Luigi Franchi S.p.A until 1980, with a total number of 30,000 examples built only for the foreign market. The sub machine gun was used by the Italian Army and Italian Navy and by the Portuguese Army as well. Luigi Franchi S.p.A was a family owned Italian manufacturer of firearms from its foundation in 1950s until 1993 when it was acquired by Beretta Holding. Franchi produced also the famous SPAS - 12. Mr. Luca Poggiali also spoke about the book Security Leadership Creativity, published by his publishing company LPE in 2019 in Italy. Today, at MILITALIA, 4-5 May 2024, Milano, Italy.
